title: Report a Broken Streetlight
description: A resident reports that a streetlight on their block has been out for several days.

tasks.description: Gather the location of the streetlight, including the nearest address and the pole number if available.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the location details.

tasks.description: Create a work order for the public works department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new work order for the repair.

tasks.description: Provide the resident with the work order number for their reference.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives the resident a tracking number.
